title: Ukulele Chord Trainer
no_more_forward: No further forward possible, you're already at the current chord.
already_latest: You're already at the latest chord.
restart_info_text: Please restart the program to apply the layout change.
info_description:
This program shows random ukulele chords and supports voice control.
It is aimed at beginners and advanced users.
short_manual_text: • Click 'Next Chord' to see a new chord.
• Or say 'next' to move to the next chord using voice control.
• Chords are shown randomly – repeats are avoided.
• All played chords are saved in 'last_chords.txt'.
timer_text: {seconds_left} seconds left until the next chord
editor_save_success_message: All data is valid. Save (dummy) successful.
editor_confirm_delete_message:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected entry/entries?
This action cannot be undone.
editor_confirm_close_message: There are unsaved changes. Save before closing?
error_editor_saving_message: An error occured while saving the data. Please try again.
error_editor_invalid_chord_name: Invalid chord name '{name}' in {level} level, row {row_index}.
error_editor_minimum_length: At least {min_length} elements must be present in {col} at level {level}, row {row_index}.
error_editor_invalid_note_format: Invalid note format '{value}' in {col} at level {level}, row {row_index}. Only letters A-G and symbols like # or b are allowed.
error_editor_invalid_interval_format: Invalid interval format '{value}' in {col} at level {level}, row {row_index}. Only numbers and prefixes like b or # are allowed.
error_editor_no_treeview_for_tab: No Treeview found for the current tab '{tab_name}'.
error_editor_empty_or_placeholder_value: [Tab '{level}', Row {row_index}] Empty or placeholder value in column '{col}'
error_editor_dot_instead_of_comma: [Tab '{level}', Row {row_index}] Dot instead of comma in column '{col}': {value}
error_editor_empty_list_element: [Tab '{level}', Row {row_index}] Empty element in list at column '{col}': {value}
error_editor_duplicate_chord_name: [Tab '{level}', Row {row_index}] Duplicate chord name: '{name}' (previously in row {previous_row})
error_editor_validation_message: There are {errors} invalid cell(s). Please fill all fields correctly and remove placeholders.
error_editor_no_selection_message: Please select a row to delete.
error_layout: Warning: Unknown layout '{layout}', falling back to 'default'
error_no_chords_for_difficulty: No Chords for this difficulty found
